1582050.name: Pax Nova - Frostborn DLC
1582050.description:
The Pax Nova - Frostborn DLC comes with a major graphical update, new content and a brand new ice planet type. This theme will permeate most of the new content, which includes new unit powers, artefacts, a new creature type, new weapons, technologies and more.

FEATURES

  • New ice planets with ice biomes
  • New space anomaly types and events
  • A Frost land creature type
  • Frostbitten and Frozen status types
  • New artwork
  • 2 new technologies
  • Celsius Implant special module
  • Arctic Sword weapon
  • Frost Pearl artefact
  • Frost Touch, Cryo Blade and Cryo Wave abilities
  • Celsius Implants and Frost Pearl to Trading Post products and Arctic Blades to Institute products
